page.title: 20TOURISM & CREDITS
page.content:
{TOURISM IN FALKLAND: Our village is the ancient seat of the Scottish kings.It is very popular with tourists who come from all over the world to see the Palace.The village has many old buildings which date back to the 16th & 17th centuries.The village lies at the base of the East Lomond Hill which is an Iron Age hill fort.From the hill you can see for miles in any direction.Our village is under the care of the National Trust for Scotland.
{CREDITS:}This survey was completed by pupils of P.7 The Computer Programmers were{:Elinor Mair,Fiona Barclay,Lynda {Rutherford,Teacher;Mr D Hunter.}Due to lack of time and school commitments our survey is as complete as we can make it within a period of 4 weeks. { }
